Knock Spawns.title: Knock
Knock Spawns.description:
All Doors within 3 tiles become opened and stay unlocked for 15 seconds
Each Chest within 3 tiles has a 50% chance to become unlocked
Knock Spawns.codex_upgrade:
Door unlock duration increased by 5 seconds
+10% Chest Unlock chance
+10% Chance to not consume Rune on usage
